QuestData.Title: Never Leave a Dinner Behind
QuestData.Description: Supplies are short, $n. We've got refugees coming into Thundermar from up and down the ridge - that's a lot of mouths to feed.$B$BPlenty of food stores were left behind as people pulled their families to safety. We need that food!$B$BScour the Thundermar ruins south, east, and southwest of here for food stores.$B$BCareful, $c! The fighting around the ruins is pretty intense.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather 10 Wildhammer Food Stores from the Thundermar Ruins.
QuestData.RewardText: It's good - hardly a worm or weevil to be found!$B$BThis is a lifesaver to the folk who fled here for survival.
